forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 69, with temperatures falling to around 65 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 13 to 17 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Patchy drizzle after 11pm. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 58. West southwest wind 7 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

weather_report:
As the golden sun graces Downtown San Francisco, the afternoon unfolds under a canvas of clarity, with soft breezes whispering tales of the bay. Highs flirt with comfortable temperatures, creating a pleasant atmosphere ideal for a leisurely stroll down the waterfront or perhaps an afternoon coffee at a sidewalk café. The sunlight dances upon the iconic structures, inviting exploration and casual conversations, while the gentle winds keep a refreshing edge in the air, perfect for those who might prefer a light sweater.

As twilight approaches, anticipation lingers in the atmosphere. The clouds gather softly, hinting at the potential for patchy drizzle later in the evening. The air cools, wrapping the city in a tender embrace, making it a splendid time for an easy walk, perhaps through one of the many parks where the sounds of rustling leaves harmonize with the distant hum of city life. Dressing in layers seems wise, allowing for comfort as the temperatures dip gently into the night. Whether seeking solace in the pages of a good book or indulging in the flavors of a local eatery, the evening promises a contemplative and cozy retreat.
